variantsAvailable: no variants available | {count} variant available | {count} variants available
previousVersionsSpareParts: This will only provide spare parts for our current version. For older products please contact the Pfeiffer Vacuum Service. Please check the operating manual in the downloads section to identify the right spare part for your requirements or contact Pfeiffer Vacuum directly.
selectVariantExplained: Please select the appropriate product variant for your individual requirements to see the corresponding product details.

priceInfo.textInfoOnlineLine1: The here shown Online Price is a reference price that does not include freight, customs and taxes and is not maintained in all global currencies.
priceInfo.textInfoOnlineLine2: To get your individual offer (in your local currency), please send us your request, so that your local Pfeiffer Vacuum Company / Partner Company will then provide you with your individual offer and pricing.
priceInfo.textInfoPersonal: This price is your personal price. It's calculated on the basis of your individual prices respectively discount agreements. The possibility to maintain your personal prices within our e-commerce system, differs within the different regions within our Pfeiffer Vacuum Sales Network. For any further questions, please connect within your local Sales Contact.

login.title: Sign in
login.pleaseLogin: Please login here to access your profile.
login.description: Please enter your E-mail address and password to sign in.
login.badCredentials: Login not possible. Please check username and password.

passwordForgotten.title: Forgot your password?
passwordForgotten.description: Please, enter your username. We'll send you an email to reset your password.

message.error: An error occurred during password reset.
message.requestSuccess: The password reset request was sent. Please check your mails.

passwordForgotten.expiredInfo: 'There is a time limit for the password reset. If you exceed the limit, the token will be invalid. You have to generate a new token to reset your password.
passwordForgotten.expiredError: 'Your reset token is expired! Please request a new token to reset your password.
passwordForgotten.passwordValidError: Your entered password is not valid. Please check your input and try again.

loginToSeePrices.rejected: You are not allowed to see prices

login.unapproved: Your account has not been approved yet
login.passwordCapitalLetter: Contains at least 1 capital letter and 1 lower case
login.passwordTooLong: Your password may be too long (max. 255 characters)

createAccountBenefitsOld.title: Create your own account now to use more functionalities. Once you registered you will be able to:

createAccountBenefitsOld.bullet2: Access the My Account area with your data and quote history
createAccountBenefitsOld.bullet3: Get in touch with us more easily
